Potion.name: Potion
Potion.description: It fills you with determination. Gain 5 Essence
Potion.use: You drink the potion and feel life coursing through your veins

Grimoire.name: Grimoire
Grimoire.description: Jona doesn't like magic. Gain 10 experience
Grimoire.use: You read the grimoire and feel a surge of knowledge. Jona disapproves.

Void Crystal.name: Void Crystal
Void Crystal.description: A crystal that has broken off from the void. Damage an enemy for 10 Essence at the cost of 5 Essence
Void Crystal.use: You crush the crystal and feel it take a part of you with it

Mirror.name: Mirror
Mirror.description: It shows you what you really are
Mirror.interact: Your reflection shows you a dead man walking. It's you. Your helmet is rusted and you see your own eyes behind the helmet. They show no sign of life. (You gain 1 level)

Soulstone.name: Soulstone
Soulstone.description: A stone that contains the soul of a fallen warrior. Gain 5 Souls
Soulstone.use: You crush the soulstone and feel the souls of the fallen enter you

Stale Bread.name: Stale Bread
Stale Bread.use: You eat the stale bread and feel a bit better

Strength Potion.name: Strength Potion
Strength Potion.description: It smells like sweat and iron. Gain increased strength for 5 turns
Strength Potion.use: You drink the potion and feel stronger

Wraith for Dummies.name: Wraith for Dummies
Wraith for Dummies.description: A book that teaches you how to be a wraith. Learn "Wraith's Prayer"
Wraith for Dummies.use: You read the book and feel a bit more wraithy
